title: "Covid19 exposure locations in the ACT"
resource_files:
- data/last.csv
runtime: shiny
output:
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggmap)
library(leaflet)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(DT)
#latest dataset
tab3 <- read.csv("data/last.csv")
# Aggregate method
cols <-c("yellow", "red", "blue")

m <- leaflet() %>% addTiles()
# 
ttn <-tab3
labs <- paste(ttn$table,ttn$Place, ttn$Date,paste0(ttn$Arrival.Time," - ", ttn$Departure.Time), sep="<br/>") 
cc <- cols[as.numeric(factor(ttn$table))]

m <- m %>% addCircles(lat=ttn$lat, lng=ttn$lon,popup = labs, radius=8,weight=8, fillOpacity = 0.8, fillColor = cc, color = cc, opacity = 0.8)






```
